name: FourSlide
description:
Your ship lands on an alien planet. You explore and boom! Your foot gets caught on a rock and you go tumbling down a mountain. You quickly regain control and now your sliding! As you slide down the cliffside all of the sudden you get shot in the air! Gravity switches around you and you land back on the ground. "This is going to be challenging." you think. 

use the left and right arrow keys or a and d to move. use the up arrow, w, or space key to jump over rocks.
